Hello,

     I am using Heritrix 3.1.1 Snapshot release. I have a script wh=
ich launches jobs on a regular basis. I have around 15 jobs. I issue curl c=
ommands to launch and monitor the jobs.

I have observed sometimes that the=
 Heritrix UI freezes. Commands to launch new jobs freeze.

On issuing a cur=
l request to :
 
  curl -k  -u admin:admin --anyauth --location https://loc=
alhost:8443/engine/

The response I get is:

------------------------------=
------------------------------------
<head><title>Heritrix Engine 3.1.1-SNA=
PSHOT-20100603.010034</title>
<base href=3D'https://localhost:8443/engine/'=
/>
<link rel=3D"stylesheet" type=3D"text/css" href=3D"static/engine.css"
</=
head><body>
<h1>Heritrix Engine 3.1.1-SNAPSHOT-20100603.010034</h1>
-------=
-----------------------------------------------------------

Under normal s=
cenarios it gives me complete listing of jobs.

Is there any reason why thi=
s happens. I checked out the heritrix_out.log but got no information or err=
or pertaining to this.

Any suggestions would be appreciated.

Thanks,
Negi=
